mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER (mem_id, mem_pass, mem_name, mem_gender, mem_birth, mem_phone, mem_address, authority, enabled, gym_code, mem_career, mem_comment, mem_img) values (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pass}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_gender}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_address}, 'ROLE_TRAINER', '1', #{gym_code}, #{mem_career}, #{mem_comment}, #{mem_img})
mapper.select: select * from member where authority='ROLE_TRAINER' and mem_id=#{mem_id}
